name: KatyBattle (base game)
description: Dear players, the main part is out. Perhaps not everyone is interested in our management, but it is in the game. Left spacebar to select all units, right spacebar to give an order. So far there is only one game and not many problems, but the game works. Wish you good luck. ****Beginners please don't take the high difficulty level, level 25 is easy ------- it's very hard!!
